text:
@realDonaldTrump Okay, I know COVID-19 has us all stressed and shit, BUT what in the hell is he talking about? Did we travel back in time? Am I the only one who stayed in the present? 

Does anybody know why people are liking this comment? Have the Red Hat Cult members traveled back in time too?
